intent_atoms.description: Execute macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark using R4 protocol once dedicated hardware runners are available.
Run macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware-dependent QA following the release readiness runbook when runners are available.
Execute random slice benchmark suite on macOS to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads once Combine support is available.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS with XCTest UI support to validate SwiftUI automation flow.
Execute Combine-backed UI benchmark on macOS to capture latency metrics while maintaining CLI throughput parity when a macOS runner with Xcode/Combine is available.
